title: Initialize Docker Environment
description: Setup docker-compose.yml with FastAPI, React, PostgreSQL, and Nginx containers. Configure local volume for file storage.

title: FastAPI Project Scaffold
description: Initialize FastAPI project structure with poetry/pip, basic configuration, and async SQLAlchemy setup.

title: Database Modeling (SQLAlchemy)
description: Implement User, Project, Task, Subtask models with all metadata fields (dates, tags, type, topic, assignees).

title: Authentication System (JWT)
description: Implement User registration and login using JWT (OAuth2PasswordBearer).

title: API: Projects CRUD
linked_req: PRD Section 6: API Endpoint Rough Sketch
description: Create endpoints for listing, creating, reading, updating, and deleting projects.

title: API: Tasks & Subtasks CRUD
description: Create endpoints for tasks and subtasks management.

title: Logic: Status Propagation
description: Implement automated logic: Subtask completion updates Task; Task updates Project progress.

title: Logic: Dependencies & Cycle Detection
description: Implement Finish-to-Start dependencies and prevent circular dependencies.

title: MCP Module Implementation
description: Create MCP server adapter exposing projects/tasks resources and tools.

title: Notifications System
description: Implement backend logic for triggers (unblocking, assignment) and email dispatch.

title: React + Vite Scaffold
description: Initialize React app with TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

title: UI System (Shadcn/UI)
description: Install and configure Shadcn/UI components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.).

title: Auth Infrastructure & Routing
description: Configure React Router, Axios client, and basic Auth Provider skeleton.

title: Login Page Implementation
description: Implement Login UI with react-hook-form and API integration.

title: Registration Page Implementation
description: Implement Registration UI with react-hook-form and API integration.

title: Dashboard Infra & Layout
description: Install TanStack Query, date-fns, and implement Main Layout with Sidebar/Navbar.

title: API: Calendar Aggregated View
linked_req: PRD Section 6: API Endpoint Rough Sketch
description: Implement GET /calendar to return all projects, tasks, and subtasks with due dates.

title: Master Calendar View
description: Implement monthly view of all due dates across projects.

title: API: Master Gantt View
description: Implement GET /projects/gantt to return project timelines for the Master Gantt view.

title: Master Gantt View
description: Implement high-level project timeline visualization.

title: Project Dashboard Layout & Stats API
description: Implement Project page shell with tabs and backend endpoint for activity stats.

title: Project Kanban Board
description: Implement Kanban view with drag-and-drop status updates.

title: Project Gantt & Heatmap
description: Implement project-specific Gantt chart and contribution heatmap.

title: Task Creation & Edit Forms
description: Implement Dialog-based forms for creating and editing tasks with validation.

title: Subtask Management UI
description: Implement inline editing and nesting for subtasks within the task view.

title: Dependency Management UI
description: Implement UI for selecting Finish-to-Start dependencies between tasks.

title: File Attachment System
description: Implement file upload UI and preview for task attachments.
